message: here i did tar xvf firefox... then i did cd firefox you can do pwd to check whats the next step to finish the instalation

❯ sudo ln -s /home/amine/programs/firefox/firefox /usr/local/bin/firefox
(base)
~/programs/firefox
❯ which firefox
/usr/bin/firefox
(base)
~/programs/firefox
❯ firefox

Command '/usr/bin/firefox' requires the firefox snap to be installed.
Please install it with:

snap install firefox

(base)
~/progr
